Ancestry-Nephilim -- Female Nephilim Human Fighter
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +0 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +2
Background: Barrister Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 141/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Nimble Hooves: +5 Speed
Divine Wings: (2) Brings forth wings that give 25' fly Speed for 10 min
Eternal Wings: Wings give continuous 25' fly Speed

Combat
Hit Points: 18 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Battle Axe (+7 1d8+2 S; strength; expert); Greatpick (+7 1d10+2 P [Crit d12]; strength; expert); Spear (+7 1d6+2 P R20'; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Bestial Manifestation (Claw): Claws inflict 1d4 HP slashing
Bestial Manifestation (Hoof): Hoof inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning
Bestial Manifestation (Jaws): Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Bestial Manifestation (Tail): Tail inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning
Blessed Blood: Blood inflicts 1d6 HP spirit on an attacker that inflicts unarmed slashing or piercing damage
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a double Stride
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Divine Countermeasures: +1 vs. divine effects
Nephilim Resistance: Has resistance 5 to choice of energy
Magic
Attack: Divine Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Cleanse Affliction (D2): (2) Reduces the stage of a curse, disease, or poison affecting touched by 1 (heightened 3rd attempts to counteract a disease or poison; 4th attempts to counteract a curse, disease, or poision)
Divine Decree (D7): (2) R40' 40' emanation inflicts 7d10 HP spirit and enfeebled 2 for 1 min on foes (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, banishment, and, for creatures of level 10 and lower, paralysis for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts death) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and increases the level of creatures that suffer paralysis by 2)
Translocate (D1): (2) TODO
Magic Notes:
Celestial Mercy: Knows the Cleanse Affliction divine innate spell; can cast it twice per day at 4th rank
Divine Declaration: Knows the Divine Decree divine innate spell; can cast it once per day at 7th rank
Slip Sideways: Knows the Translocate divine innate spell; can cast it twice per day at 5th rank
Celestial Magic: Knows choice of two 2nd-rank divine innate spells; can cast each once per day
Fiendish Magic: Knows choice of two 2nd-rank divine innate spells; can cast each once per day
Summon Nephilim Kin: Can cast a summoning spell to call divine allies as a 5th-rank divine innate spell once per day
